department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Greek Exegesis of 1 Corinthians
course.meeting_text: W., 1-3 and hour to be arranged.
course.description: The course is devoted to close reading and interpretation of 1 Corinthians. Discussion of the Greek text of 1 Corinthians will focus on literary style, use of rhetoric, philology, and the social and theological issues of the text.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1551.
